subject: Entrepreneurship
title: The Future of Lean
description: A short lesson to help you apply The Future of Lean.

hook.text: AI and no-code tools have made building an MVP faster than everâ€”sometimes in hours, not weeks.

buildup.text: With tools like GPT and Bubble, a solo founder can test a business idea in a single afternoon.

discovery.text: The build-measure-learn loop is accelerating. What took Ries months in 2008 now takes days.

twist.text: But speed creates a new problem: founders ship so fast they skip the 'learn' step entirely.

climax.text: The future of lean startup isn't faster buildingâ€”it's deeper learning and smarter experimentation.

punchline.text: Speed without learning is just faster failure.

quiz.question: What new challenge does faster MVP development create for lean startup practitioners?
